%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%  Definition of titlepage  %%
%%  Do not edit              %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\newcommand{\UDOTitle}[9]{

  \thispagestyle{empty}
  \includegraphics[width=3in]{images/tud_logo_rgb.jpg}
  \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
  \\
  {\parindent0cm
  \rule{\linewidth}{.1ex}}
  \begin{flushright}
    \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
    \sffamily\bfseries\Huge
    #1\\
    \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
    \sffamily\bfseries\large
    #2\\
    \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
  \end{flushright}
  \rule{\linewidth}{.1ex}

  \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
  \begin{center}

    \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
    \large #5\\

    \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
    \large Course of Studies: #4 \\[1mm]
    \large Matricle Number: #3\\[1mm]
    \large Supervisor: #8 \\[1mm]
    \large Co-Supervisor:  #9 \\[1mm]

    % \vspace*{\stretch{1}}
    % \large Bearbeitungszeit: #6 -- #7

    \vspace*{\stretch{2}}
    \large Chair for Enterprise Computing\\
    \large Faculty for Computer Science\\
  \end{center}
}
